inclusion.criterion: Active smoker of 5 cigarettes per day for at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Plan to stop working at Walgreens in the next 12 months
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Currently use a form of tobacco other than cigarettes (as this may influence biochemical testing)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Are unable or unwilling to access the internet
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Do not have reliable computer or internet access
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, with a history of smoking and current employment at Walgreens. However, he plans to stop working at Walgreens in the next 12 months and does not have reliable computer or internet access.
